questions.question_text:
A small company needs to print several color copies of the same contract to go to various departments and customers. Which of the following printers will be the
QUICKEST?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Le paramètre à ajuster est la Position. Nous devons ajuster l'agencement des moniteurs dans les paramètres d'affichage pour correspondre à leur disposition physique réelle. Cela permettra au pointeur de se déplacer correctement entre les deux moniteurs.

questions.question_text: A technician connects a second monitor to a desktop. It is physically located to the right of the existing monitor, but the mouse pointer can only get to the second monitor by moving to the left edge of the screen of the first monitor. Which of following display settings needs to be adjusted to get the pointer to move with the physical placement of the monitor?

discussion.content: c Image drum that coursing that!

questions.question_text: A computer technician is responding to a call about a printer that is causing streaks to appear on every printout. Which of the following is the MOST likely cause?

discussion.content: this one is a dumb question .20 years experience in hardware and never heard of this .

questions.question_text: A technician replaces a defective 250GB hard drive in a desktop with a 2TB hard drive. After installation, the computer detects the new 2TB drive as a 250GB drive. Which of the following should the technician do to fix this issue?
Which of the following RAM types can continue working if there is corrupt data?
